nz.co.abrahams.asithappens
Class DataPoint

java.lang.Object
  nz.co.abrahams.asithappens.DataPoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<DataPoint>
public class DataPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<DataPoint>

Stores a value of observed data along with the time of the observation.

A DataPoint may have an undefined value, which represents the fact that an observation was attempted at a certain time, but the observation failed to complete successfully.

Author:
mark
